alert.note: Alert for Dawson; Furnas; Gosper (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued June 24 at 10:47PM CDT until June 24 at 11:45PM CDT by NWS Hastings
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1100 PM CDT FOR CENTRAL GOSPER...SOUTHWESTERN DAWSON AND FURNAS COUNTIES... At 1045 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Eustis to 10 miles north of Holbrook to 11 miles northeast of Norcatur, moving east at 50 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. In addition, at 1040 PM CDT the public estimated 60 MPH wind gusts nine miles south of Eustis. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Cambridge, Arapahoe, Elwood, Beaver City, Holbrook, Wilsonville, Hendley, Johnson Lake and Farnam. This includes Interstate 80 between mile markers 231 and 232. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...OBSERVED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
